moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
    It makes more sense to think about PIP insurance as health insurance, rather than automobile insurance. PIP is insurance that pays your medical bills like health insurance when you are hurt in an automobile accident.
  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.
  • Premises Liability
    Any place that is open to the public has a responsibility to maintain that establishment in a safe and clean condition. When an establishment fails to do so, they can be held responsible for injuries that occur as a result of their negligence.

articles:
• Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
    It makes more sense to think about PIP insurance as health insurance, rather than automobile insurance. PIP is insurance that pays your medical bills like health insurance when you are hurt in an automobile accident.
  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.
  • Premises Liability
    Any place that is open to the public has a responsibility to maintain that establishment in a safe and clean condition. When an establishment fails to do so, they can be held responsible for injuries that occur as a result of their negligence.
description:
The Pendas Law Firm is a bilingual personal injury and insurance law firm that serves all of Florida from offices in Fort Myers, Orlando, Daytona Beach, West Palm Beach, Tampa, Bradenton, Fort Lauderdale, Miami, and Jacksonville. With many offices throughout Florida, we serve a greater number of people in dire need of legal support, especially those whose primary language is Spanish.

Several of our senior attorneys bring more than 20 years of litigation experience to our legal team, and the firm itself has been in operation since 2004. We serve and protect people who have sustained injuries, lost a loved one, or suffered other losses due to another party’s negligence.

Our trial lawyers handle personal injury cases involving medical malpractice, nursing home negligence, automobile accidents, unsafe premises and defective products. We also assist clients with insurance claims, personal injury protection (PIP) and uninsured motorist (UM) coverage. Many working Americans don’t have health insurance or disability insurance, and a sudden and serious injury can be devastating. We understand this, and are prepared to take on insurance providers, law enforcement officials and liable parties on your behalf. With our help, past clients have recovered hundreds of thousands of dollars in legal compensation for sustained injuries and losses suffered.

Client satisfaction is more than important to us – it’s why we do what we do. The Pendas Law Firm was founded in response to a growing need in Florida for high-level legal service and representation grounded in a genuine care and understanding of a client's situation. If you and your family are struggling to finance or otherwise overcome a recent accident or injury, contact our office in Ft. Myers for a free consultation to see how we can help. If other parties are at fault for the injury, we may be able to recover monetary compensation.
